content.detailedDescription: I was outside, under the stars, leaning back in my fold-back chair just waiting for my space-bearing friends to make another appearance. as it is, they visit every night i go out to look for them. since this was a particularly beautiful night, i knew they would come. most nights i see at least four or five, although occasionally i only see one. i can always expect to see at least one peer through the clouds as if to say "hi!, i'm just seeing if your still there". last night was different. as usual i saw the initial orb. my traditional calling method is a trained 10 second solid laser beam directly overhead. i am always careful not to direct my beam at any aircraft. the first orb appears and often a chain reaction is started and more appear. on this night, they just kept appearing. i did not keep count but there were over a dozen. they came from all directions with different intensities and distances. one orb appeared directly overhead and was traversing the sky towards the south. i took my led flashlight and flashed out a code. immediately, the orb began to grow in intensity as if flying towards me at a great speed. within seconds the defined round light went from the size of a pea held at arms length to penny sized, then to quarter size and finally to about the size of a golf ball. when the object got to the size of a golf ball or greater, fear seized me once again and i could no longer remain in my chair. i made way to the front door and as i turned to look back, realized the object had begun to retreat the same way it had advanced, diminishing in size and intensity. had i remained in my chair, i have no doubt the object would have continued to advance towards me. i do not know if fear is saving me or if it is keeping me from knowing the truth. presently and honestly, i am at an impasse. if i continue to observe these objects, all the while allowing their advancement, will i find their inhabitants to be friendly? or will there presence be more of an malevolent nature. it is said that fear is necessary for survival, however it can also be a detriment to exploration. i know that if these beings intended to pursue or harm me, they could have easily done so by now.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Uforbs communicate with light

content.detailedDescription: I was walking with two friends when one of us noticed these lights overhead, a bit to the north over the santa ynez mountains. they were a very vivid red, and as we watched we could see them moving around a bit. wondering what they were, we watched them for several minutes. while i'm assuming these lights represented objects, i never saw anything but the lights. furthermore, there was little to no cloud cover so if these were objects it would be very difficult to say how far away they were. after we had watched them move in no discernible pattern for several minutes, we were shocked to see them start to pulsate a bit, one by one, then disappear. this was the end of the sighting. i had heard of people seeing things they could not explain in the sky before, but not until then had i seen anything myself.
content.flightPath: Stationary
content.summary: 5 solid red lights. moved around a bit, then disappeared one by one after about 6 or 7 minutes

content.detailedDescription: I was walking with two friends when one of us noticed these lights overhead, a bit to the north over the santa ynez mountains. they were a very vivid red, and as we watched we could see them moving around a bit. wondering what they were, we watched them for several minutes. while i'm assuming these lights represented objects, i never saw anything but the lights. furthermore, there was little to no cloud cover so if these were objects it would be very difficult to say how far away they were. after we had watched them move in no discernible pattern for several minutes, we were shocked to see them start to pulsate a bit, one by one, then disappear. this was the end of the sighting. i had heard of people seeing things they could not explain in the sky before, but not until then had i seen anything myself.
content.flightPath: Stationary
content.summary: 5 solid red lights. moved around a bit, then disappeared one by one after about 6 or 7 minutes

content.detailedDescription: I was at the farm riding around checking my livestock.  i was observing several large airliners because my farm is in the dfw flight path.  for some reason i looked to the southwest and i saw an orange dot with no contrail moving very fast and disappear.  it reappeared a second later and disappeared, again.  i see large airliners all the time in which they emit contrails, especially late in the evening.  this had no emissions and what was eerie, it appeared and disappeared.  i never saw the object again.  it was like it vanished.  it was a clear beautiful evening.  i look at everything in a scientific way, but this is something that i can not explain.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path
content.summary: Fast moving orange object

content.detailedDescription: I keep my night vision camcorder and night vision binoculars on the kitchen table just in case something shows up. it was about 4 am and i was up for a glass of water when i looked out the south patio windows and saw a moving lights. i grabbed my night vision binoculars and it confirmed my eyes were not playing tricks on me. so i set the night vision camera to 16 mega pixles and zoomed to 4x and fired off about 6 shots. two proved to be fuitfull. they are attached.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change
content.summary: More lights over sherwood park

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking outside in the parking lot at work doing my rounds . 
this is at the corrections center were i work as a corporal . 
as i was checking on a officer working a gaurd staition outside we 
were both looking up it was a very nice perfect night no wind around 72 temp no clouds and no moon . 
then seen out of the black still night a triangle shape craft around 75 degrees up  appeared not moving fast at all . it was heading north towards ft worth texas coming from the south . 
i figure it was around 500ft to 1000ft away and around 4,000ft to 6,000ft up . it had dim rounded lights that could be seen very well one light inside the other  starting at the tip and working there way back for a set of 6 lights .As it moved north , i walked with it moving through the parking lot the parking lot lights will light up as you pass under them 
. so seen from above they are turning on one by one . 
the craft started to pick up speed so i moved faster then it moved faster untill i was running about that time it just took off flat and level so fast as a blink of the eye . 
as i turned back to see the other officer was right with me we headed back to the gaurd station and there was a squad car stoped  the officer was out of his car asking if we were ok . he had seen us running through the parking lot thinking we were chasing some one . ya we were chasing somthing i said and told him what we had seen . he  was in disbelief
at 1st then frustration like he had just lost the loto winning ticket.
he said ( we have been getting calls about that all evening ) . 
after getting back inside and telling some other officers what we had seen 
one officer said he herd people calling into disbatch . disbatch was 
disbatching calls about suspicious activity in the skys . 3/24/12 3am . 
to get a grasp of its size do this take your index finger and thumbs and place them togther like a triangle shape and stretch out your arms . that craft was a little larger then that at around 4,to 6, ft up . 
my guess is compearing its size to the building sizes it was passing over to be around 150ft to 200ft wide and 250ft to 300ft long no smaller then this only larger . and it made no sounds and moved more like it was slipping through the sky then using the sky to keep it up .
content.flightPath: Straight-line path
content.summary: Triangle over corrections center cleburne texas

content.detailedDescription: i was looking at pics and ran across this pic around area 51 that i took, didnt see anything at that time, my dad and i were there, taking pics.
content.summary: Just seen on pic today march 26th 2012

content.detailedDescription:
I am posting this picture for my niece. she was traveling south from north carolina to tampa. she does not remember exactly where or what time of day the photo was taken (her camera date and time was not set correct).

she was riding with 2 other people in the car.

however, i thought this is worthy of sharing.
content.summary: Caught a ufo on camera

content.detailedDescription: it was evening around 1930hrs approximately and i was in the garden bird watching when all of a sudden i noticed in the background this black thing flying across the sky "thanks to the bird..Lol" which looked strange because it had a shape of a "r2d2" (that's the perfect shape to describe it) but it also had 2 probes sticking out the sides and the bottom like hands and legs. it was just flying across the sky silently at a steady slow pace and disappeared behind some trees in a distance. i waited for it to reappear but failed to locate it after losing it behind the trees. i could see clearly it wasn't a garbage bag or a balloon for sure. immediately i took out my camera phone to record it but i was a bit shaky from excitement nevertheless still  managed to capture it on my nokia c6-01 8mp.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path
content.summary: Kuala lumpur malaysia, what appear's to the naked eye to be an unidentified flying object shaped like a humanoid with 2 antenna like probes on the sides and the bottom, streaming silently at slow speed across the sky and disappears behind the trees!

content.detailedDescription:
As i walked outside of my condo to have a smoke around 10-10:15 pm on friday march,23 2012 in sparks nevada i happened to look to my left (east) and i noticed three slow moving unusually bright lights that were white and had a super slow extended bright flash and did not have any other colored lights such as the red and green lights that you would see on aircraft, at first i thought that they were perhaps three large individual aircraft's like those double rotor helicopter but i quickly discounted that because they are extremely loud and there was no noise, (not to say that they don't) but in all the years that i've lived here i have never seen a double rotor helicopter fly at night. 
  i live directly under the flight path of the reno/cannon airport and am well versed with aircraft that comes and goes in a northeasterly direction. i would also like to mention that i cannot every remember seeing any aircraft travel in the area of the siting  especially at that altitude for that matter.  
  i suddenly realized that whatever i was seeing appeared to be one object because they were moving together so perfectly, the lights were in a staggered or diagonal shape, the first light was about 500-1000 feet above the hills due east that make up the reno-sparks valley, then the second light was approximately 30 degrees up & behind the first and i give the same description for the third light in relation to the second light.
  as mentioned the lights were perfectly spaced and never seemed to loose there spacing and the lights were not typical looking at all in that they were super bright and had a very slow or extended brightness and yet the lights seemed to stay lit unlike a strobe, i also noticed that the highest of the three lights didn't get brighter but maybe once, really strange.       

  at this point i yelled out for a family member to 
"come check this out!" then with a serious amount of adrenalin running through me i quickly i bolted upstairs to get my video camera and of course by the time i got back downstairs it was barely visible through trees and the larger than usual high tension power lines that run down sullivan lane.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path
content.summary: huge w/ 3 extremly bright lights w/ slow flash

content.detailedDescription: I was on the phone and walked outside when i noticed a blueish ring of light in the clouds. on further inspection it was clear that the ring had equally spaced balls of blue light. after getting a few photos and for a minute or so the objects and the ring increased luminosity substantially. that did not last very long and after 20 minutes total it had faded away and i went back inside. about 10 minutes later my father told me that it was back. i went outside and observed the same ringlike formation and more glowing spots in the clouds much higher than the initial ring. within a minute or so another ring much higher above it had formed. this ring appeared to be made up of 6 seperate balls of light which seemed to be moving slowly and steadily in altitude and direction formed a semi circle. then 3 lights moved more east and the other 3 went west creating a gap and their positions appeared in tandum forming a (  ) pattern. all this time the original ring had reapearred and over the next few hours would dim out then randomly gain luminosity. sometimes there would be no change and appear to "hover" for up to 20 minutes before dimming or changing into unidentifiable formations. during form changes the light was too dim to effectively be caught on my camera. i walked a few blocks to get a better view and after a couple hours the objects seemed to form a pattern resembling a parachute with beams that went below my sight due to tree cover. all colors were either blue or blue with a hint of white. the beams of light appeared to be gathered at a cental ground point. this lasted about 10 minutes. the objects did not seem to me to be farther away but were dim during this time. my first reaction was "did i just get duped by an elaborate light setup?" i found this unlikely as this was the only period during which any illumination went towards the ground. the weather had a mild cloud cover. a short light rain began after witnessing the initial "ring" and stopped before the event ended. the lights appeared to move much higher in elevation and some would move farther outward from view. there was always a noticable central ring of at least 6-12 clearly seperate orbs. very shortly before the parachute formation with "beams" i watched a lower flying dual jet aircraft heading straight towards the objects parrarel to me but the same trajectory. the aircraft got to a close enough to think "this is about to be interesting" when it made an immediate 180 flew for  several seconds, made a right turn flying for a minute or so then another right. this aircraft clearly gave a wide berth to the objects. sometime between 330am and 339 the "ring" formation faded away completely. prior to this even when no orbs were visible and the ring had significantly faded out, the area of the clouds it had been stayed obviously illuminated to some degree. the maximum time between the "fading" before a "fade in" was no longer than 15 minutes. my camera was insufficiant to reliable capture anything other than when formed in a ring as any other activities reduced their lumination below the capability of my camera. there are a couple pictures that were able to capture the beginning of formation changing. albeit they are not that great.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Observed ring of light appearing to be close to a mile in diameter. noticed several balls of blue light that later moved into different formations.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were at the cielo grande soccer field/ track walking on the far west side of the track where there was a row of trees, around 9:45pm. we noticed a red/blinking white light heading east bound (no noise). then noticed what had appeared to be a disk tilted at a angle at the time about nw(same colored lights). we started to notice that the objects were moving towards us at a quick pace, slowly decending which had seemed to be about 400 ft. (we tried to use our cell phones to record what we were seeing before we ran)... my friend, inital reaction seemed to be a fight or flight response, i kept looking at the objects as they approached. he said to me, "run, run!" as we ran through the soccer field we kept looking at the lights as they appeared over us (possibly 100-300 ft. in the sky). as we ran, we noticed a car pulling up to the parking lot; as they seen us running toward their direction... they immediately left right as we made it towards a street lamp. as we stood there we watched the triangle shape objects head south bound for about a good 5 mins. then discussed what we had seen, my friend no longer wanting to stay we parted ways and headed home.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangular lights.

content.detailedDescription: For the last few weeks i have been watching these strange lights in the sky .So one day i opened my front door at around 7 o'clock p.M.And right up above the tree line there they where just hovering. does the gov.Send out drones just to watch it's citizens.
content.summary: I have been getting picts and video for a few weeks over the northern p.A. area,these are right my front door

content.detailedDescription: Last week i video taped stange lights outside of my house in northern p.A. here the still shot. i could'nt figure out how to zoom in and post the pictures, not a computer geek. so you can do all the smart guy stuff.
content.flightPath: Stationary
content.summary: Starlike orbs that when i later examined and zoomed in was very horrifing.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside smoking a cigarette and watching a plane when i noticed what looked like a orange star that seemed to be moving. as i watched the light it started to glow and turned bright white and increased in size by roughly 3-5 times. at the same time it started dropping orange ball of fire from the bottom. after it dropped the balls it dimmed and change back to a a a orange/reddish color, then it moved a couple of miles to the left and dimmed a little more then it moved back to it's original position, flickered and then it started moving off to the right and all lights went out and it looked to be changing from solid to transparent, then it disapeered.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Object was orange and small then turn bright white and large and dropped fire balls.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my balcony, 2nd story, just having a smoke when i noticed a particularly bright star, it flashed multicoloured and very random brightness, definately didn't look like any of the other stars, or planets, it's not venus or mars. the altitude was roughly above the tree tops. this is the second time i've seen it in almost the same spot within a couple weeks. i believe its a ufo, not sure what its doing there but i took some pics the 1st time i saw it and they didn't turn out so great, so i took some more tonite and they turned out weird... it doesn't look like a star at all, and i can't really distinguish a real shape at all, seems to be constantly moving or changing or something. also no colours showed up in the pics, but did on video. it doesn't do anything except hover there so i went in after taking pics and put them on my computer, looked at them and wanted to get some more but the 'star' was gone 1/2 an hour after i initially saw it. i'm using a kodak easyshare m531 digital camera with 14 mega pixels and 3x optical zoom. i also pointed it out to my bf as well to get a second opinion, and he said it did look odd for a star. i'm very interested in stars, ufos and anything unusual really. i will continue to watch ;) i have alot more pics, i just kept snapping to make sure i was gonna get some good ones.
content.flightPath: Stationary
content.summary: Looked like a star that wasn't twinkling right, multicoloured and random flashes of brightness as well as colours

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home, and had gone out to smoke a cigarette.  i am not sure of the time,   i was   looking west to see if i could see  the   planetary "show"  the news was talking about.  i looked between two treetops  just gazing at the sky.  i ad not been able to see the planets because of the trees. so i was looking at the  open space between two trees where i knew the planets would not be, and wasn't thinking about anything beyond getting chores done.

then a light appeared slightly above the treeline  between the trees and it started slightly descending and moving south.  it looked like a closeup of a very tiny meteor falling, only the angle was  slight and the movement was slow.  the  "meteor"   went behind the trees and i could see it's brightness through them but then the  thickness  was such in the treeline  that i no longer saw it.   

i remember thinking  what could that be?  it wasn't a firefly, they blink.  it wasn't a meteor, this was  low to the ground, and so slow.  but the trail behind it was just like that of a meteor.    i went to the street and knowing i could not see anything to the west from there i looked to the southeast.  all i noticed was an aircraft moving west, but it was too far away to tell what it was other than it was man-made and it was not the  thing i saw. 

i felt  a bit  frustrated at not knowing if the little object landed or hit the earth, and not knowing what it was..  other than that i felt nothing out of the ordinary.  i did think   twice about reporting it here because i am not even sure whether it was  what you'd call a ufo.  i don't know or sense that it was man made and i don't know whether it was  intelligently   controlled or just an anomaly of  nature or something.....


the skies were clear.



all i can say is that it was  like a meteor, only really tiny and low  and slow.  i had a sense it was less than 30 feet away and  not really a meteor.
content.flightPath: Unknown
content.summary: what looked like a very slow moving meteor  small, close, descending below treeline

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a small town with my grandparents. we live within 15 miles of bradley int'l airport and see many airplanes, day and night, fly by. on march 25, 2012 me and my grandfather went out to walk our dog at 11:00 pm. when we turned around to head back at 11:10 pm, when i suddenly whirled around for no apparrent reason toward some trees of our neighbors and in the sky, over the mountains, about 5-10 miles away, 500-1000+ ft. up, were two very close together sets of lights at nearly a standstill, almost a hover. bear in mind, that at this distance, the object would have to have been very large, possibly a mile or more, since the lights were the distance apart of a golfball held at arm's length. 

far to close for any airplanes to be together, which was what made me realize it was something very abnormal, and not any airplane. 

at their speed, they would have passed over us while we were running. they did not, however, they just seemed to appear where they were over the mountains as i turned around. then the lights slowly started accelerating away, mainating a perfect "golfball's width at arm's length" for about 2 minutes and 45 seconds. then, all of a sudden, the lights broke their distance, increased speed, and started rapidly descending for about 1 minute over the mounains until they disappeared, as if they had been found and did not want to be seen. 

as i witnessed the event, and afterward, i had this vague growing feeling that these lights were somehow connected or part of a larger object that was unseen. what compounded my belief that this was an actual ufo sighting was that i believe i saw 2 military aircraft fly overhead just before and after the sighting. all of the commercial and passenger airplanes that fly into bradley int'l airport all have yellow forward lights. these were the very first airplanes i have ever seen to have led forward lights. these craft were also flying significatly faster than any of the commercial or passenger planes that ply overhead. 

i have seen many airplanes pass over while i'm at work, and seen many pass over at night, but this was unlike anything i have seen for 15 years or more, since i was a little boy of 5 or less. it was truly a feeling of awe and mystery of something truly unknown had happened that i have not felt for a very long time and i do hope someone is willing to hear my story for what what it really is, and not just another attempt for attention.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Walking my dog with my grampy, at about 11:10 pm, i turned around and saw a hovering set of lights about 5-10 miles away.

content.summary: Walking my dog with my grampy, at about 11:10 pm, i turned around and saw a hovering set of lights about 5-10 miles away.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a small town with my grandparents. we live within 15 miles of bradley int'l airport and see many airplanes, day and night, fly by. on march 25, 2012 me and my grandfather went out to walk our dog at 11:00 pm. when we turned around to head back at 11:10 pm, when i suddenly whirled around for no apparrent reason toward some trees of our neighbors and in the sky, over the mountains, about 5-10 miles away, 500-1000+ ft. up, were two very close together sets of lights at nearly a standstill, almost a hover. bear in mind, that at this distance, the object would have to have been very large, possibly a mile or more, since the lights were the distance apart of a golfball held at arm's length. 

far to close for any airplanes to be together, which was what made me realize it was something very abnormal, and not any airplane. 

at their speed, they would have passed over us while we were running. they did not, however, they just seemed to appear where they were over the mountains as i turned around. then the lights slowly started accelerating away, mainating a perfect "golfball's width at arm's length" for about 2 minutes and 45 seconds. then, all of a sudden, the lights broke their distance, increased speed, and started rapidly descending for about 1 minute over the mounains until they disappeared, as if they had been found and did not want to be seen. 

as i witnessed the event, and afterward, i had this vague growing feeling that these lights were somehow connected or part of a larger object that was unseen. what compounded my belief that this was an actual ufo sighting was that i believe i saw 2 military aircraft fly overhead just before and after the sighting. all of the commercial and passenger airplanes that fly into bradley int'l airport all have yellow forward lights. these were the very first airplanes i have ever seen to have led forward lights. these craft were also flying significatly faster than any of the commercial or passenger planes that ply overhead. 

i have seen many airplanes pass over while i'm at work, and seen many pass over at night, but this was unlike anything i have seen for 15 years or more, since i was a little boy of 5 or less. it was truly a feeling of awe and mystery of something truly unknown had happened that i have not felt for a very long time and i do hope someone is willing to hear my story for what what it really is, and not just another attempt for attention.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Walking my dog with my grampy, at about 11:10 pm, i turned around and saw a hovering set of lights about 5-10 miles away.

content.detailedDescription: Was taking random photos of morning sky with planes,contrails and chemtrails when i looked back at photos saw orbs in 1
content.summary: Random photo caught orbs in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from shooting some landscape photography. passing through the west side of seguin on texas 46 just north of us 90 sometime between 8:33 and 8:40. i was looking at the crescent moon lined up with jupiter and venus when i noticed what i thought were tail lights reflecting on my windshield. i noticed that the shape was odd though. i pulled over, rolled down the window and the lights were still there in the sky. there were 3 red lights in a triangle formation with a 4th light off to the left of the group of 3.  the lights were solid for the most part (not blinking), but one did fade. they hovered for about 15 seconds. i pulled out my camera and managed to get one picture. they started to move away to the north. i started to follow them but they suddenly disappeared. i was wondering if the lights could be helicopters, but there was no sound of helicopters, just cars.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path
content.summary: 3 solid red lights hovered then moved and disappeared
